name: Free? WIFI
description:
"What would you do if you don't have internet but you wanted to play game so bad"

Free?WIFI

THIS GaMe WiLL lEt YoU ExPeRiEnCe HoW DeSpErAtE yOu Are WhEn YoU aRe In NeEd Of ThE iNtErNeT!!!

Just kidding, this game is a normal casual collect object game that lets you find a free  Wi-Fi signal to download the games you're looking forward to playing. But you forgot to pay for the internet. So you have to scout for a  free Wi-Fi signal. But be careful as the wifi owners will be chasing after you!!!

This game made by a student
From: Bangkok University
Subject: GI344 Section 329E
